creator: phar0e@socal.rr.com
text:
From the point I upgraded from 2.0.28 -> 2.0.32 my SSI's no longer worked for 
index.shtml which was the default DirectoryIndex, but it worked when I went to 
http://mydomain/index.shtml but not http://mydomain.

creator: rbb@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in CVS, and will be available in the next release of Apache 2.0.
*** Bug 7738 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: slive@apache.org
